name: Color Wave
description:
Color Wave is a first person shooter and puzzle platformer game where colored sauces propagate as waves and change the way each obstacle behaves. Master the effects of the sauces on white blocks as you progress through the game. Unleash the power of the sauces by shooting with the Sauce Gun. Change the sauces at will in order to progress and solve different styles of puzzles.All that while moving around strange networks of floating platforms that extend around you, dotted with tables, chairs and all kinds of objects you would find in any fast food restaurant. And don't forget about the giant flying burger above you!
